front.title: An Addressing Architecture for virtual Private Network Identifier

abstract.t: In this document we present an addressing architecture for VPNIdentifier. Addressing Architecture presented in this documentallows to identify VPN in globally unique manner. It introduces anon overlapping address space for different classes of VPN (L3 VPN,VPLS etc..). The addressing architecture presented in this documentallow to identify attributes of the VPN as part of the VPNidentifier through an embedded attribute field.
